Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $9,500 for this exclusive item. We're confident this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
